                   double xMax,

                   double yMax,

        Moves the robot to the point that it has to launch the ball. It stops and turns to the target. Then calls the launcher to launch a ball.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        xMin -
        xMax -
        yMin -
        yMax -
        numBalls - Number of ping pong balls to shoot

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double x,
                     double y,
                     boolean obstacleAvoidance)
        This function takes as arguments the x and y position in cm Will travel to designated position, while constantly updating it's heading
        Parameters:
        x - destination x coordinate
        y - destination y coordinate
        obstacleAvoidance - determines if the obstacle avoidance feature is activated or not

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double targetAngle,

        TurnTo function which takes an angle and boolean as arguments The boolean controls whether or not to stop the motors when the turn is completed
        Parameters:
        targetAngle - The angle in degrees

        public static double convertAngle(double radius,
                                  double wheelDistance,
                                  double angle)
        Converts angle that the robot should turn into the angle that the wheels have to turn in degrees
        Parameters:
        radius - of the wheel
        wheelDistance - distance of the two wheels of the robot
        angle - that we want the robot to change its heading to
